TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Fonts extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides enumeration support for and objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features. These feature differences include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>, such as italic, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>, such as bold.
![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> GetFontFamilies(string location) cil managed

Docs.param: The location that contains the fonts.
Docs.summary: Returns the collection of objects from a string value that represents the location of the fonts.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects from a font location.
[!code-cs[FontSnippets#100](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/FontSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#100](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/fontsnippets/window1.xaml.vb#100)]

Docs.exception: The is . You cannot pass , because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> GetFontFamilies(class System.Uri baseUri) cil managed

Docs.param: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the location of the fonts.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects from a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] location.
[!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/fontsnippets/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontssnippet1)] [!code-cs[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/FontSnippets/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontssnippet1)]
To return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects in an application's resources, use the "pack://application" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] notation shown in the following example.
[!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/fontsnippets/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontssnippet2)] [!code-cs[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/FontSnippets/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontssnippet2)]

Docs.permission: For reading the contents of the specified . Associated enumerations: .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> GetFontFamilies (Uri baseUri, string location);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> GetFontFamilies(class System.Uri baseUri, string location) cil managed

Docs.param: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
The location that contains the fonts.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects from the resolved font location. In this case, the application contains a subdirectory named "resources".
[!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/fontsnippets/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontssnippet3)] [!code-cs[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/FontSnippets/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontssnippet3)]
